name: town guys
description:
Created for: OpenGameArt's Summer Game Jam 2022

Best played 4 players! (No controller required)

Chop wood, build a town, make workers work for you, pay taxes, FUN!

The following works were used in the creation of this game:

    Sketch Town Expansion

Author:     Kenney
